Implemented netstat-based port availability check during port configuration. Validates ports are free before assignment. Warns if port currently in use but will be reclaimed.
Created fetch_litellm_models() function to retrieve available models from configured providers. Framework supports OpenRouter, Groq, Gemini, and DeepSeek APIs. Returns model lists for user selection.
Implemented model selection UI that displays available models from all configured providers. Supports individual selection or 'all' option. Validates model selections against provider capabilities.
Implemented Docker healthcheck directives for PostgreSQL, Redis, LiteLLM, Qdrant, Meilisearch, and MinIO. Services now use 'condition: service_healthy' for proper startup ordering.
Defined explicit subnet (172.28.0.0/16) for ai-platform network. Ensures consistent IP allocation and prevents conflicts with host networks.
Ensured all services have proper volume mounts. Added validation for data persistence paths. Configured user/group ownership for monitoring services.
Added set -euo pipefail for strict error handling. Implemented validation for all user inputs. Added fallback values for optional configurations.
Documented all gaps identified against AI Guide v75.2.0. Created systematic comparison of implemented vs. required features. Identified missing model deployment configuration.

Problem: Introduced syntax error in root check

Implemented Tailscale container with network_mode: host. Added required capabilities (NET_ADMIN, SYS_MODULE). Configured authentication key and hostname variables.
Implemented OpenClaw service for document processing workflows. Configured admin credentials and data persistence volume.
Implemented gdrive service using prasmussen/gdrive image. Configured OAuth2 credentials (client ID and secret) and sync strategy.
Implemented code-server for browser-based development. Configured password authentication, user permissions (PUID/PGID), and workspace volume mounts.
Implemented Jupyter Lab service with scipy-notebook base image. Configured token authentication, user permissions, and notebook persistence.
Implemented Dozzle for real-time Docker log monitoring. Configured read-only Docker socket mount and web interface access.
Implemented Portainer CE for Docker container management. Configured admin password, Docker socket access, and HTTPS port.
Reorganized services by category (Core, Vector & Search, Storage, Monitoring, Communication, Productivity, Management). Added category-based selection with descriptions.
Added environment variables for all 23 services. Included service-specific configurations, API keys, credentials, and port assignments.
Implemented start.sh, stop.sh, restart.sh, status.sh, logs.sh, backup.sh, restore.sh, update.sh, and health-check.sh for platform management.
